title: Newport (Pembrokeshire)
name: Y Garth 5* Boutique B&B

reviews.content: This is my hotel of choice whenever I have a short stop-over stay. The staff are very friendly and are very generous on room upgrades for Platinum-level priorityclub programme members. Very nice King Suite provided, with great bathroom, quality bed and many other top fittings. Free WIFI in the lounge bar (after purchasing a drink) is very useful too. As per other reviews the hotel is perfectly located for quick and easy transfers back to any of the airport terminals. Thanks again for a wonderful stay and I wish I had stayed longer!
reviews.author: Crawford Hamill

description: Luxury accommodation situated near Newport - within a 10minute walk of coast path/100yds from coastal bus pick-up/drop off; Free Wi-Fi; Private Parking. Visit Wales 5 * Gold Award for past 5 years; 2014 AA Breakfast Award.
